mapper.select: select u.User_no, u.NameHan, substring(u.StudResNum,1,6) StudResNum, (case u.Gender when 1 then '남' when 2 then '여' end) Gender, u.Cellphone, us.School, us.Major, g.GisuName, a.TestResult, a.ApplyDate, a.TestDate, a.Deposit from Users u, ApplyInfo a, Gisu g, UserScholarship us, Curriculum c where u.User_no=a.User_no and u.User_no=us.User_no and a.Curriculum_no=c.Curriculum_no and c.Curriculum_no=g.Curriculum_no and c.Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no}
